contents: the cat chased a small mouse into the garden
a friendly dog played fetch by the river
bm25 is a ranking function widely used in search engines
boolean retrieval uses logical operators like and and or
tf-idf weights terms by frequency and rarity
neural retrieval uses dense embeddings for semantic search
the dog and the cat slept on the same couch
the library hosts a workshop on information retrieval
students implemented bm25 and compared it with tf-idf
the chef roasted chicken with rosemary and garlic
a black cat crossed the old stone bridge at night
dogs are loyal companions during long hikes
the dataset contains fifteen short sentences for testing
reranking models reorder bm25 candidates using transformers
the dog sniffed a cat but ignored the mouse
